titles.title: Dakota Mainstem Water Supply Project Feasibility Study Act
Dakota Mainstem Water Supply Project Feasibility Study Act

A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study to determine the feasibility of constructing a project to supply municipal, rural, and industrial water to the Dakota Mainstem Regional Water System service area in the States of South Dakota, Iowa, Nebraska, and Minnesota, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
